constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 29 (Monday, February 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CARTER of Georgia:
H.R. 1043.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to make rules for the government and
regulation of the land and naval forces, as enumerated in
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H514]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: Proportional Reviews for Broadband Deployment Act
